course_title: Family/Emergency Nurse Practitioner II: Medical Emergencies
class_notes: Online with synchronous sessions: Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD.
course_description: Students are prepared to evaluate and manage patients in pre-hospital, urgent care and emergency department settings. Common medical emergencies are discussed along with emergency care management, pharmacologic/non-pharmacologic interventions, cost-effective practice and patient/provider communication.
prerequisites: NRSG 545 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1871, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-4:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
